Package arc.scene.event

Class InputEvent

java.lang.Object
arc.scene.event.SceneEvent
arc.scene.event.InputEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pool.Poolable
public class InputEvent extends SceneEvent
Event for actor input: touch, mouse, keyboard, and scroll.
